title: Yelp Business Scraper Input
description: Configure your Yelp search and enrichment options

search.title: Search Query
search.description: Business type or name to search (e.g., 'plumber', 'restaurant'). Used if Yelp Search URL is empty.

location.title: Location
location.description: City, state, or address for the search (e.g., 'New York, NY'). Used with Search Query.

yelpSearchUrl.title: Yelp Search URL
yelpSearchUrl.description: Optional: Provide a full Yelp search URL. This overrides Search Query and Location.

maxResults.title: Max Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of businesses to scrape

fetchContactsFromWebsite.title: Fetch Contacts from Website
fetchContactsFromWebsite.description: Visit each business website to extract emails, phones, and social media links

contactPagePaths.title: Contact Page Paths
contactPagePaths.description: Additional paths to check on business websites (one per line)

useProxy.title: Use Proxy
useProxy.description: Enable proxy usage (requires proxy access on your Apify account)

useResidentialProxy.title: Use Residential Proxy
useResidentialProxy.description: Use Apify residential proxies instead of datacenter (requires RESIDENTIAL proxy access)

debugScreenshots.title: Debug Screenshots
debugScreenshots.description: Capture screenshots on failures for debugging
